summary: All six requested frontend requirements for Meta Quest 3S support appear to be implemented: Quest-specific UI guidance was added to the Downloads panel and build instructions overlay; runtime Quest/Android detection was introduced and used to adjust messaging; VR-friendly CSS adjustments were added; and index.html now includes an appropriate viewport meta tag. A couple of extra, non-requested documentation/state-tracking changes were also introduced.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/updated standalone Android APK build documentation file outside the in-app overlay.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only required extending the in-app build instructions overlay; adding a separate ANDROID_APK_BUILD.md is not explicitly requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Introduced/updated a project tracking/state file with AR-* request entries marked pending.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest does not ask for a project_state.json tracker or AR-* request records as part of the implementation.
